mapper.update: update devote set devote_state=#{devoteState}, devote_id=#{devoteId} where devote_id=#{devoteId};
mapper.insert: insert into vote(user_id, candidate_id, devote_id) values(#{userId}, #{candidateId}, #{devoteId});
mapper.select: SELECT count(user_id) FROM group_member WHERE group_id = ( SELECT group_id FROM promise WHERE pro_id = ( SELECT pro_id FROM devote WHERE devote_id = 0 ) ) AND user_id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM vote WHERE devote_id = 0 );
